messages.message: When asking some questions the data returned seems to be truncated at page boundaries. In this example there are a list of objects over 3 pages. itâ€™ll only give me the data from page one

yeah this is related to how we do chunking and merge answers from different chinks together. @Lee can you give this example to @Hari tomorrow? the team is actively working on encoding tables in a document to solve getting tables that span multiple chunks. It'll be great if they can have your example as a benchmark
